hero.title: AI-Generated Fashion Models: Revolutionizing How You Showcase Apparel
hero.description: Generate AI models wearing your products using only one flat-lay image and drive more sales.

demo.heading: Features That Transform Your Fashion Imagery

product_1.1: Get credits to try polara on your own clothes
product_1.2: Pay-as-you-go by purchasing the generation credits you need

product_3.2: Overnight batch process hundreds of clothing items

questions.question: How can I generate clothing images for my clothing brands?
questions.answer: Polara lets you upload flat-lay photos of your items and then generate AI photos of models wearing the clothes by simply describing them.

questions.question: What type of photos should I upload to generate my clothing images?
questions.answer: Photos of the clothes laid flat or on mannequin work the best. You can also use images of the item already worn by someone, but you should crop the image around the item to help the AI focus on it.

questions.question: Will Polara maintain patterns and prints of my items?
questions.answer: Prints and patterns are hard to keep consistent across all generations. Depending on the complexity of the clothing, you may have to generate multiple photos before getting a satisfying one.

questions.question: Can I use Polara to try-on clothes on myself?
questions.answer: Not at the moment! The tool has been thought for brands as an alternative to photoshoots.

questions.question: Will the AI photos have defects?
questions.answer: Sometimes yes. There will always be a probability to generate aberrations such as an extra arm, deformed eyes, etc. Currently, about 80% of photos you generate will be good enough and we are consistently working to improve these odds.

questions.question: How much does Polara cost?
questions.answer: Our prices start at $0.5 USD per photo generated. You can buy credits as you need them or subscribe to a plan for monthly credits. The higher the subscription, the lower the cost per credit. Subscriptions help us better forecast compute costs to run our AI models and thus offer the most competitive prices possible.

questions.question: Can I get a refund if I am not satisfied with the output?
questions.answer: Unfortunately, we cannot offer refunds as costs incurred running AI models is extremely high (compared to traditional software). When a photo is generated, we pay for the processing time used by the GPU, regardless of the photo quality and cannot ask for a refund ourselves. During sign up you agree to withhold your right to refund for this reason.

subHeading.2: built with React & Next.js (App Router & Server Actions), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, React Email & Resend, Vercel hosting.
